messages:
Name: Anderson Talisca
Nationality: Brazil
Date of Birth: February 1, 1994
Position: Attacker
Current club: Guangzhou Evergrande
CSL clubs played for: Guangzhou Evergrande
Guangzhou Evergrande's Anderson Talisca joined the club on January 1, 2019.
The last CSL appearance that Talisca made came on November 12, 2020 for Guangzhou Evergrande against Jiangsu Suning; a match that he played 90 minutes in during a 2-1 loss.
Guangzhou Evergrande, who are top of the table with 21 points, entertain Henan Jianye on August 5 the next time the team are in CSL action.
Last season for Guangzhou Evergrande, Talisca made 17 CSL appearances, scored six goals and provided two assists.
Talisca linked up with Guangzhou Evergrande in January 2019 from Benfica, for whom he made 53 league appearances in total, scoring 12 goals.
